title: The Popes benediction, or, His generall pardon to be purchased onely with mony and without penance sent into England by Ignatim Holy-water a Iesuit to the Arch-bishop of Canterbury and to the rest of his subjects there.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
notes: Attributed to John Taylor.  Cf. NUC-pre 1956.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
